item.title: Using an I2C OLED Display with the Raspberry Pi Zero W
item.description: Environment Board Raspberry Pi Zero W OS result of lsb_release -a No LSB modules are available. Distributor ID: Raspbian Description: Raspbian GNU/Linux 10 (buster) Release: 10 Codename: buster OLED display HiLetgo 0.96" I2C シリアル 128×64 OLED LCDディスプレイSSD1306液晶 Setting i2c Enabling i2c sudo raspi-config select 5 Interfacing Options select P5 I2C select Yes Installing packages sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install i2c-tools python-smbus Connect to OLED Wiring confirm pin assign http://xn–ccke1di9d4h.
